entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Near blizzard developing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 53 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending overnight then a few clouds. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
